meanings.definition: In a way that does not change or go out of style
meanings.sent1: The classic design of the watch will remain timelessly elegant.
meanings.sent2: Her beauty shines timelessly, unaffected by passing trends.
meanings.sent3: Even after many years, his jokes are still timelessly funny.
meanings.sent4: The love between them was like a timelessly burning flame.
meanings.sent5: The wisdom in his words resonated timelessly with all who heard.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is not affected by the passage of time
meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins stood timelessly against the changing landscape.
meanings.sent2: The melody of the song echoed timelessly through the halls.
meanings.sent3: The painting seemed to capture a moment timelessly frozen in time.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a beacon that shone timelessly in people's memories.
meanings.sent5: The story of their friendship was etched timelessly in the hearts of many.
